extends Object
implements Serializable
    A SimpleSocial user.
    Author:
    Francesco Landolfi

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(String username,
            String password)
        User constructor. username represents the name of the user, password its password.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        password - the password used by the user

    • Method Detail

      • setFriendRequestDuration

        public static void setFriendRequestDuration(long duration)
        Sets the duration of the friends requests. If a friend request is not within that duration, the request is expired and cannot be accepted anymore.
        Parameters:
        duration - the duration of a friend request, in milliseconds

      • setFriendRequestDuration

        public static void setFriendRequestDuration(String text)
        Sets the duration of the friends requests. If a friend request is not within that duration, the request is expired and cannot be accepted anymore.

        The format accepted by this method is the ISO-8601 standard (PnDTnHnMn.nS)

        Parameters:
        text - the duration of a friend request, in ISO-8601 format (PnDTnHnMn.nS)
        See Also:
        Duration.parse(CharSequence)

      • getFriendRequestDurationMillis

        public static long getFriendRequestDurationMillis()
        Returns the friend request duration, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the friend request duration, in milliseconds

      • getFriendRequestDurationString

        public static String getFriendRequestDurationString()
        Returns the friend request duration, in PnDTnHnMn.nS format (ISO-8601 standard).
        Returns:
        the friend request duration, in PnDTnHnMn.nS format
        See Also:
        Duration.toString()

      • getUsername

        public String getUsername()
        Returns the name of the user.
        Returns:
        the name of the user

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(String password)
        Checks if the given password is the same of User's.
        Parameters:
        password - a password
        Returns:
        true if password is the same of the User, false otherwise.

      • isFriend

        public boolean isFriend(User user)
        Checks if user is a friend of this User.
        Parameters:
        user - the User to check
        Returns:
        true if is a friend, false otherwise

      • saveRequest

        public boolean saveRequest(User user)
        Saves a friend request from the given user. Note that a request sent from a User already friend or that has already sent a friend request will not be saved.
        Parameters:
        user - the User who sent a request
        Returns:
        true if the request is saved, false otherwise

      • hasPendingRequestFrom

        public boolean hasPendingRequestFrom(User user)
        Checks if this User has received a request from user.
        Parameters:
        user - the User who might have sent a request
        Returns:
        true if user has sent a request, false otherwise

      • acceptRequest

        public boolean acceptRequest(User user)
        Accepts a request from user. Note that a request can be accepted only if it was already sent and is not expired.
        Parameters:
        user - the User who made a request
        Returns:
        true if the request is accepted, false otherwise

      • addFollower

        public boolean addFollower(User user)
        Saves user as a follower. Note that only friends can become followers.
        Parameters:
        user - the new follower
        Returns:
        true if user is now a follower, false otherwise

      • addPost

        public void addPost(Post post)
        Adds post to the received posts.
        Parameters:
        post - the Post to add

      • getUnreadPosts

        public List<Post> getUnreadPosts()
        Returns a List of received and unread posts. Once this method is called, the returned Posts are considered read.
        Returns:
        a List of received posts.

      • getFriendsList

        public List<String> getFriendsList()
        Returns the List of the names of User's friends.
        Returns:
        a List of usernames (Strings)

      • getFollowersList

        public List<User> getFollowersList()
        Returns the List of User's followers.
        Returns:
        User's followers
